## POLLENStake class

Represents a user's POLLEN stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class POLLENStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getPOLLENStake()](./lib-base.readableberaborrow.getpollenstake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `POLLENStake` class.
